channel.title: Host name
channel.description: I cant seem to find the problem, after i run my server what should i do to open my server? i tryed typing the ip but it said maby its down bla bla, is it because of host name? answer plz :)

item.title: Host name
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

use the ip 127.0.0.1

and make sure u are on the right port… when u run server… it should say running under 5555 or 43594…

use that ip ^^ and change ur port according to what your server is running off of

Read full topic
